features: 𝐎𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐈𝐜𝐞𝐝 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐇𝐨𝐭 𝐂𝐨𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐞 𝐌𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐫: Discover 3 brew modes to cater to your unique taste preferences, guaranteeing a delightful coffee experience every time; STRONG Brew for a bolder flavor, OVER ICE Brew for refreshing over iced coffee without dilution, and REGULAR Brew for a classic, balanced taste

𝐁𝐫𝐞𝐰 𝐖𝐢𝐭𝐡 𝐏𝐨𝐝𝐬 𝐎𝐫 𝐆𝐫𝐨𝐮𝐧𝐝𝐬: This single-serve coffee maker comes with a K-pod adaptor and a reusable adopter; Brew a single-serve cup of coffee with 20g freshly grounds for ultimate flavor or with a coffee pod for ultimate convenience; Both adapters are dishwasher safe

𝐁𝐫𝐞𝐰 𝐒𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐥𝐞 𝐂𝐮𝐩 𝐏𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐂𝐨𝐟𝐟𝐞𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐉𝐮𝐬𝐭 𝟑 𝐌𝐢𝐧𝐮𝐭𝐞𝐬: Savor a freshly brewed cup of coffee in just 3 minutes with the GAVASTO single-serve coffee maker; Say goodbye to the tedious chores of manual grinding, measuring, and brewing, making your morning routine filled with graceful

𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢-𝐂𝐮𝐩 𝐒𝐢𝐳𝐞 𝐀𝐯𝐚𝐢𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 & 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐨𝐯𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝟒𝟎𝐨𝐳 𝐖𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐫 𝐑𝐞𝐬𝐞𝐫𝐯𝐨𝐢𝐫: Brew 6, 8, 10, or 12oz of your favorite hot coffee using either coffee pods or grounds; The removable 40 oz reservoir ensures you can brew multiple cups of delicious coffee without the hassle of constant refilling; Perfect for coffee enthusiasts or those hosting a tea party with friends

𝐄𝐚𝐬𝐲 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐑𝐞𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐝𝐞𝐫: Built-in descale reminder will flash white to notify you it’s time to deep clean the coffee maker; Press BREW and CUP SIZE Buttons for 3 seconds to start the deep clean process with 15-oz. descaling solution; Ensure optimal brewing performance and prolong the single brew coffee machine service life

𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐇𝐨𝐦𝐞 𝐔𝐬𝐞 & 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐥: 12.08" H x 5.51" W x 11.14" D; The compact design effortlessly fits into any countertop setup; Comes with a removable drip tray, and the portable coffee maker is also suitable for 7 inches (17.8 cm) travel mugs, enjoy your warm cup of coffee anytime in just minutes even on a trip

𝐔𝐬𝐚𝐠𝐞 𝐓𝐢𝐩𝐬: ①Use ONLY with US standard voltage 110V-120V; ②Fill the reservoir with enough water before brewing; ③For initial use, brew a cycle with water only, no coffee, to clean the single serve coffee maker; This will help clean the coffee maker and better extract the essence of the coffee

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Indulge in the pleasure of a freshly brewed cup of coffee whenever you desire. 1. Discover the GAVASTO Iced and Hot Coffee Maker, offering 3 brewing modes ( REGULAR, STRONG, OVER ICE) to cater to your taste preferences. 2. Get a perfect cup of coffee in just 3 minutes with the GAVASTO K cup coffee maker, ensuring a fast and convenient brewing process. 3. Enjoy the flexibility to use either K cup pods or grounds with the included adaptors, allowing you to customize your coffee choice. 4. Choose from 6, 8, 10, or 12-oz. cup sizes to accommodate your desired serving size, providing versatility for different occasions. 5. The 40-oz. large reservoir eliminates the need for frequent refilling, saving you time and effort during your coffee-making routine. 6. The built-in descale reminder ensures optimal performance by notifying you when it’s time for deep cleaning, extending the lifespan of your coffee maker. 7. The iced coffee maker is designed to be compact and space-saving, making it perfect for small kitchens, offices, or limited counter space. Its compact size ensures that you can enjoy a freshly brewed cup of coffee without sacrificing valuable countertop space.

Select Regular, Rich, or Over Ice for your grounds or coffee pods ●Regular Brew Mode: In this mode, the coffee maker typically follows a standard brewing process, which involves evenly extracting flavors from the coffee grounds to produce a balanced and mild cup of coffee. The water is usually heated to a specific temperature, and the brewing time is optimized to produce a standard coffee strength. Regular brew mode is suitable for those who prefer a milder coffee taste. ●Strong Brew Mode: Strong brew mode is designed to extract more flavor and intensity from the coffee grounds, resulting in a bolder and stronger cup of coffee. In this mode, the coffee maker increases the water temperature slightly and extends the brewing time to enhance the extraction process. This mode is often preferred by those who enjoy a robust and pronounced coffee flavor. ●Over Iced Brew Mode: Over-iced coffee is a popular cold beverage made by pouring brewed coffee over ice. It’s a refreshing and convenient way to enjoy coffee during hot weather or when you prefer a chilled drink.

What is the ratio of water, iced, and grounds to make non-watery iced coffee? ●6oz water, 6oz ice, 15g ground coffee (or a K-pod). ●Add additional ingredients to enhance the flavor of your iced coffee. Common additives include milk, cream, sweeteners like sugar or flavored syrups, or even whipped cream if you prefer a more indulgent treat. Stir well to mix the ingredients.

The self-cleaning function keeps your coffee machine in the best performance. By using this function once every three months, the coffee maker can avoid any clogging problems and effectively prolong its service life. All you have to do is add the descaling solution and water in proportion, then hold pressing the BREW and CUP SIZE button for 3 seconds to run.

Coffee Machine Questions & Answers Why does the Over Iced Coffee still brew HOT? The GAVASTO iced and hot coffee maker brews hot, concentrated coffee directly over ice to quickly cool the hot coffee. This process gives you iced coffee in under 3 minutes, maximizes flavor extraction, and leaves you with a refreshing cup of iced coffee. Can I fill the tank with hot water? Must be filled with room temperature water of about 77°F (25°C) in the water tank of GAVASTO coffee machine, instead of heated water. Why does coffee overflow when I use an 8-ounce cup and point to the 8-ounce button? The flow rate of the single cup coffee maker varies depending on the type of coffee powder. The flow rate calculates by range, not value. 1-2 OZ error in the flow rate of the coffee machine is reasonable. We suggest testing the position of the cup that corresponds to the different capacity options you use to avoid overflowing coffee before the first use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hot coffee even after you add cream!
reviews.reviewText: Very appealing to the eye, space saver. But best part is great coffee that comes out super hot...so much better then my Kuerig I had.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far so good!
reviews.reviewText: Had a problem at first...machine quit working. Contacted customer support and they replaced it immediately at no cost to me. Will have to see if the new one continues to work. So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Coffee Maker
reviews.reviewText: This is a nice coffee maker. Compact and well made. It is a little slower than others, but my hubby and I really like it. I thought it was a great price for it. Thank You.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: After reading the comments on this coffeemaker I decided to give it a try,I was tiredOf the bitter taste coming from my Keurig.Love the size and versatility of this machineAnd the coffee is amazing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Bad coffee maker
reviews.reviewText: I do not like anything about this product. It takes about 10 minutes even if it’s turned on for all the buttons to light up before you can make a cuppa coffee. I think it feels very cheap and looks very cheap. I don’t know why the reviews give it a five, but I give it a one and I tell you do not buy it, this is a 49-year-old who is trying to use it and 85-year-old and a 45-year-old

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I gave this coffee maker 3 stars because it does do what it is supposed to. It brews a hot cup of coffee. That said, I really don’t like it. When I use a k cup the coffee is really watered down. I’ve tried all the different brew sizes and my coffee is just not good. I had better luck using the enclosed permanent filter and ground coffee, but it still tastes weak and watery. It also takes FOREVER to brew. I’m going to go back to Keurig and just keep this one as an “emergency” coffee maker cause I don’t want to go through the hassle of returning it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great cup of coffee
reviews.reviewText: Generally satisfied with this unit. My Kuerig finally died on me so I wanted a not-so-expensive replacement. Decided on this unit.Pros1. Makes a great cup of hot coffee.2. Sleek design! It's footprint on the counter is much smaller than my previous single cup unit.3. The extra bold option works as promised, making the coffee about 25% stronger imo without making it taste weird.4. Trick: if you don't like your coffee piping hot like me, use the iced coffee option, the water comes out less heated.Cons1. Made in China.2. The main reason I gave it 4 out of 5 stars is the 6/8/10/12 ounce options. They are all off about 1.5 ounces too much. Doesn't sound like alot but it meant the coffee came up to the rims on my usual mugs. Fortunately I had a couple larger mugs but still it is a bit annoying. This is using the 8 ounce option (for a mug!).3. It's not speedy. Figure 3 minutes, no big deal cuz I just changed my morning routine to time it right.4. It does splatter a bit more than my old Kuerig but not a show stopper for me. I'm gonna try finding something to raise the cup up more, something I read on another comment.I still haven't decided about where the refill tank is (on the back). Having it on the side with my old unit was more convenient imo. It requires a relatively steady hand when sliding it back in when refilled but it does slide in easy. Also the control panel is a bit over-complicated but it's probably due to the cold coffee option.All in all, so far I'm glad I bought the unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m just only one morning coffee person in my home and really can say that this coffee machine is great for single serving. Whatever is on K-cup pods or ground coffee this coffee machine not disappoint me.Modern simple and clean design for small spaces on counter top. It’s my experience so far and I enjoy.
